metadata.synopsis: Vignette: In the Dead of Night one-liner. Flaming fist dealing with a nuisance citizen making a report. Thinks the player is about to do the same.

0.speaker: Fist Jimi Borleas
0.text: I'll make a report to the city maintenance teams. They'll fix it, eventually.
0.context: NodeContext: Not holding out much hope of this

1.speaker: Fist Jimi Borleas
1.text: Don't worry about the smell, citizen - probably just the drains. Nothing to concern yourself with.
